name: Legends of Pixelia
description: Legends of Pixelia is an action RPG that combines retro pixelart with modern gameplay mechanics. Choose a hero class, crawl through procedurally generated dungeons and show your reflexes in challenging boss fights. Single player & local multiplayer, best played with gamepad.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
